title: Teen shot near Huber Heights elementary school
content:
Please install the latest Adobe Flash Player Plugin to watch this content.
HUBER HEIGHTS, Ohio (WDTN) — A teenager is in the hospital following a shooting outside of Wright Brothers Elementary School in Huber Heights.
Police were called to the 5700 Block of Harshmanville Road around 7:30 p.m. Sunday.
Officials say a neighbor called 911. When officers got there they found a male teenager yelling in the parking lot for help.
The teen was taken to the hospital with non-life threatening injuries.
The victim told police he got into an argument that escalated to a fight, at which point he was shot. Two suspects took off in a red four-door vehicle, according to police.
Authorities say drugs were found at the scene.
Anyone with information should call Huber Heights P.D. at 937-233-1565.
